entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
The number of days the respondent used hallucinogens in the past 30 days.
Respondent's best estimate of the number of days they used hallucinogens in the past 30 days.
The respondent's age when they first used LSD.
The year when the respondent first used LSD, recoded.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent used hallucinogens in the past 30 days.
Relates the respondent to their best estimate of the number of days they used hallucinogens in the past 30 days.
Relates the respondent to their age at first use of LSD.
Relates the respondent to the year they first used LSD, recoded.
